title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior of custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 specification
description: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 specification states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting, but this behavior is currently not observed in the trunk version. The default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used instead. Attached is a war file that reproduces this issue.
OB: The Servlet 3.0 specification incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
EB: The default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used instead of the custom cookie name specified in the Servlet 3.0 specification.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war' 2. Access the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'
